#### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking a contractor to provide fire fighting equipment maintenance services for Navy vessels and equipment within the Halifax Region Municipality area. The services include maintenance, repair, and inspection of fire fighting equipment, as well as fire protection systems. The contract is expected to last for one year, with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

#### Requirements
- The contractor must be able to provide fire fighting equipment maintenance services as and when requested.
- The contractor must have experience in maintenance, repair, and inspection of fire fighting equipment and fire protection systems.
- The contractor must provide estimates and invoices according to government regulations.

#### Notice Type
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) under a competitive open bidding process.

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting entity for this tender.

#### Regions of Delivery
- Halifax, Nova Scotia (HRM)
